name: Chill Haunt
description: The Chill Haunt is a medium-sized undead with incorporeal movement, making it able to pass through physical barriers. It has a ghostly appearance and emanates a chilling aura.
memorable: Its unique ability to absorb fire damage for healing makes it a formidable foe in combat, especially against fire-using opponents.
goals: To drain the life force of the living and instill fear.
relations: Often found haunting cold or dark areas, it may accompany other undead creatures.
environment: Typically found in cold, dark locations such as abandoned ruins or frozen wastelands.
strengths: Immunity to cold, fire, necrotic, and poison damage, along with several condition immunities contributes to its resilience.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to nonmagical attacks, which can limit its effectiveness against certain foes.
attacks: Uses its Shivering Touch to deal cold and necrotic damage, causing ongoing cold damage over time if the target fails a saving throw.
most_powerful_ability: Cryophobia, allowing it to ignore cold damage but potentially becoming frightened by its source.
senses: Possesses darkvision to see in darkness, and a passive perception of 13 enables it to notice hidden foes.
skills: Skilled in acrobatics, enhancing its ability to avoid attacks.
additional_information: Can pass through creatures and objects, incurring damage if ending inside an object.
Resistance to several damage types makes it hard to defeat with normal attacks.
While low in strength, high dexterity allows for agile evasive maneuvers.
Its fear-inducing ability adds a strategic element in combat scenarios.
test_queries: creature that heals from fire attacks
monster with incorporeal movement and cold damage
